Extremely fun game to play with friends or alone. Very easy to play for hours on end. Very smooth and pretty realistic for a drifting game, with lots of customization!

It‚Äôs no Gran Turismo but you will appreciate the video game simulation of a stereotypical racing game.  More enjoyable online with players, cuz who doesn‚Äôt want to get out smoked by a chick drifting an illegally modded Lambo, amirite?
this game is fun and great grapichy and much more
Very fun game to play with friends, has deals all the time if you wait, you wont have to pay so much, thanks carx for such an affordable and very good drifting game!

One of the car games of all time. You'll have fun until you don't.

Oh and if you are new. go and download kino mod, the community carries this game.

It's a fun game and I do think it's worth it! I had a blast just drifting around the different maps and it's nice that you can add more maps from DLC's and the Steam workshop. It's also nice that you can calibrate your steering wheel and pedals to your liking inside the games settings, it makes a huge difference.
its very fun and as a new player the wheel support is  very good
great game. Stunning  graphics great game play
Really dope gameplay at a really dope price. The gameplay is smooth and customization is great.
Love this game soo much. The settings are suitable for my style of play and the graphics are good too
its a lil hard it is a good game i reccomend it but it takes a bit to get good im not even that good
this game is insane. especially for people who LOVE to drift, and/or love cars. I would 100% recommend this game to others even if you do not specifically like cars
Nice graphic , gameplay , but sometimes server laggy
Wayyy better than what I expected. Must play for car guys who love drifting.
great game if you love drifting as much as I do, it's fairly easy to get the hang of on keyboard so i would highly recommend this game
I just recently bought CarX and I can for sure say that this is one of the best racing games there is
really fun arcade game  at some point it gets repetitive but i am still coming back to it because it is really fun
its a clean and good drift game, really drift focused, not much racing but its still absolutely wonderful
Smoke blun, join a random server, get sideways and crash into admin, next you see is a vote againts you. Low key fun
The game is cool, a steering wheel would make the experience even better
Extremely fun game. Very easy to play for hours on end. Very smooth and pretty realistic for a drifting game, with lots of customization!
w game, i was never interested in cars until i got this game. all of a sudden i'm addicted to watching drift videos on youtube as well as cars. great game with a great community.
Endless customization, probably the best Simcade on Steam. Absolutely soul pleasing. Put on Spotify playlist and you'll be sliding for hours!
Good game to have fun, online communty is friendly, they should have tried a Trucking game too.
Great game with nice physics just needs more maps
Very Good game  the graphics and the texture are really good but dont run on low end devices
Clean Game. A lot of Fun! (and NOT 100 gig to install) great graphics, and Mods Enhance (Not Change) the game and make it that much better! ..... Find Me On The Track!

Its still great after so many years and constant updates, way better than the mobile counterparts. If you catch it on sale, get the season pass, as it gives you a ton of super cool liveries and presets + free cars. Despite the name, it can be played offline, unlike CarX Street. Does not sync progress with mobile versions, completely different progression system.

Wow. Got this game on sale. The best drift experience with controller so far. Plus online features is amazing. Workshop support is amazing. The only downside is the cars are not licensed. hence weird names. Other than that, great satisfying drift experience.
Game is very good with great graphics and details. There are many settings to change that make your gameplay the best. overall great game
If you are looking for a drifting game that makes it easy to drift and still fun and challenging then this is the game you have been looking for....even though its like 4 years old it still hits lol.
Bruh I been playing this gaming with my homie that just got into cars and he's a football player and he loves this game so far. Drifting is so much fun in this game especially multiplayer.
This game is fun easy better with friends i would recommend i totally did not grind these hours while afk but i will recommend
super great game i love the quality but there is minor details that need to be fixed such as glitching too much etc overall great game for pros and newbies.
good solid game it can get stale at times but you always find yourself having fun
Best drifting game on a steering wheel even though at the start it is hard but if you play regularely you will get good fast. A banger of a drifting game, i recommend strongly !!!  : )

CarX Drift Online offers a smooth, enjoyable drifting experience with plenty of customization options. Multiplayer stands out - hosting custom lobbies and setting your own rules makes it easy to find players with a similar style. The handling isn‚Äôt pure simulation but feels consistent once you adapt. Car tuning and visual customization are deep and well-designed, especially with the Season Pass unlocking all cosmetics, cars and tracks. Despite a few minor flaws, it‚Äôs a chill, rewarding drifting game. Highly recommended.

fun game but can someone please explain the white and red bars in the angle meter? far as im concerned hitting that white bar is the only way to get the ultimate angle thing but the second i go there, it doesnt matter how much i countersteer the car spins out
probably just a skill issue, but im confused.
its alright have playd for many years on playstation chould'v hade so much better graffices and better drifting experience but it has been alot of fun playing with friends and random people
best time to just hang out and amazing customization and fine tuning of suspension

CarX Drift Racing Online has to the most fun game where it supports keyboard, wheels and controller. With endless customization, vehicle choices, multiple realistic tracks, workshop and more! I've spent so many hours digging in to maps and having so much fun!
Its a good game its just when using a steering wheel it can be tricky you have to change all the settings or atleast that what i did or else it didnt let me use my steering wheel
Played this game entierly at work 1h-2h over like last 2 years, good game to earn money while having some fun.

It has better customisation than Forza and Nfs combined, This is a game made by drifting fans, for drifting fans, I can't even state how excited I am for CarX Drift 2 with all the new features and improvements

Picked this up on sale for $3 and it was $3 well spent. This is an addicting game with great courses and an awesome car selection. (although the actual call makes and models are not in the game, but all the cars are essentially real makes and models) but I must say, the developer must love Nissan, because 30 to 40% of the cars in the game are Nissan but hey that's fine. I don't mind sporting 5 or 6 different GTR skyline models. 

The weak points of the game are lack of verity of maps, and the music is nothing great at all. Its not like annoying or anything, but it's definitely not appealing in anyway. 

But overall I do really enjoy the t is game and will still be putting time into it to at least get all the single player achievements. For $3 this is a 9/10 but at full price, maybe a 7/10

Got it on the free to play weekends, so here is my thought:

im mostly a grip racing guy and since the game is mainly for high tuned drifter community i still enjoy it, like yea you can tune your car into mostly anything, drag, grip turn, and rally (sort of but you can). and even tho im absolute ass at drifting and have no knowledge of how to tune a proper drift car, the game AND the community can help you understand the most basics of this game, still ass at it but i'm getting the hang of it.

but by far this the none other than the greatest drift sim you'll ever try. best game engine. cultured and chaotic community, and cars
very nice game. worth the money. even better with mods
Its realistic (mostly) and has GREAT mechanics and graphics. Would reccommend to others.
so fun just tandeming w other players and js chilling!
the best sit back and relax drift game

Fun af drifting game, (spending most my time making liveries lol)
No story mode, just drifting, tuning, and modding 10/10
Get you some mods from kino and this game is hard to beat with a good group of friends. game has come a lonngg way
super fun played on console wanted to try on pc so much better
have been on this game since it dropped havent had any issues with it and love it to this day

Fun, I Mostly Design Liveries But The Game is Fun

Not enough trans;
Its quite good. All your fav cars are here, promise.
good game and fun to play
Its very fun i recomend and its better with friends
Australian made classic Fords including the XB interceptor the falcon 500 ute and more omg heaven. great game and physics

Great game if you're into cars! The drifting's really fun but the car tuning and customisations are beyond that. The game lets you tune and colour every part of the car. Definitely recommend if you're bored and like cars especially japanese cars
Das Spiel ist sein Geld wirklich wert, es ist interessanter als die kostenlose Version.
multiplayer is where its at in this game. it community over content and the mods prove it
with 2400 slow hours on this game, it still vibes with me. no matter how long ive been away not playing. everytime i jump back in its a vibe.

THE Best Drift Simulator i've come across. i've played a few, but not all. and this one ranks #Number1. Highly Recommended By Yours Truly. Highly customizable and will have you fine tuning everything from sway bar links to weight, psi for turbos (bar if your euro), and everything in between. 9.8/10 would recommend!!!

Yeah, pretty good game, the car models are pretVVVVRRRRRRRMMMMMMM *BRAP* *shift up* *VVVVRRRRMMMMMMMMMMMM* *chooooooo* *turbo spools* *BRAP* *shift up* *VRRMAATTTAATTAAATTAA* *redlining in second* *SSSSSSSSCCCCCCCRRRRRRRRRCCCCCCCCCCHHHHHHHHHHHH* *drifitng* *vvvvVVVVVEEE* *choooooooo* *turbo spools* *vvvvrrrrrRUMMMMvrrrrr* *reving* *vvvVVVVVRRRRRAAAMMMMM* *PAP* *pops and crackles* *SCRRRRRRRRRRRCH* *e-brake into parking spot* *vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvdo-* *engine off* *click-clack* *door opening and closing*
fun game to chill with friends
The Best Drift Game i Ever Played Great To Play Preffer You to.
overall amazing game definitely putting more hours in
i love the game it is cool and it is not to hard to drift 10
Easily the best game for a lover of drifting.
goated ass game, buy when its cheaper
you customize car,and car goes sideways.what else could you want?
One of the best gmes to playwithyour friends.
I have played carx since 2019 and its a goated game
good graphics, 10/10
its fun and easy to drift
its a smooth drifting game dispite its age
fun to play with friends!
This game is still very good in late 2025.
nice drift control
this game is absolutely awesome like i can play this forever
Best game for when you are with your friends!!!!
very goood game, recommend
super clean super fun
its a crazy easy drift game buy this rn
one of the best of drift games i played . love it
gets boring  after a while
wanna mod it? go for it. its gonna be a fun time vanilla or modded

negative.review:
I‚Äôm genuinely disappointed in the publishers of this game. This title is a nostalgic part of a franchise I‚Äôve loved for years, but after buying it, I realized the greedy developers didn‚Äôt spare even the smallest and most basic items. They turned almost every little thing in the game into paid DLC!
I hope you wake up and put an end to this blatant greed, because as things stand, I will never be willing to purchase any new installments of this game again.

only played just couple of minutes of it and just feels janky and shitty on controller, doesnt feel good and even feathering the throttle its either too much or not enough, too much turn or not enough going into walls, doesnt feel constant just feels wack
This game sucks. Bad. Plays like a mobile game. Save your money and buy Asseto Corsa, or spend a little more and buy BeamNG.Drive.

im honestly extremely disappointed i was extremely excited to play this game but ever since buying it its been completely unplayable, i have gigabyte internet and cant make it 15 seconds into hosting my own lobby without rubber banding to the point of being so pissed at the game that i uninstalled because of how unplayable it was the devs need to figure their shit out so the servers are actually stable :( im extremely unhappy and wish i never spent the money on this game
this games is so poorly optimized, for example in gta 5 i get 120 to 130 fps in high settings and in this game i get 40 to 70 fps. game looks like its running in 480p rez
If you like forza horizon, and other unrealistic goofy games, this might be for you. If you like realistic drifting, go elsewhere, just my opinion
quite poor experience, multiplayer sucks and theres no hook - boring!
shit game i have played this game for 40hours and i have never linked a single turn and i have gone though 6 wheels and controllers and its just not made well pls don't waste your money
This games complete garbage I set all my bindings right for my wheel and nothing works just floors the car right when I start it without pressing nothing else
Bought it for drifting in VR, and all I have to say is: a poorly optimized, bad-looking game with terrible steering wheel controls.
game is trash handling is so fake  i cant even comprehend on how to drive worst waste of money ever
wont connect to servers even tho im connected with no issues via ethernet cat8

literally every aspect is riddled with bugs
3/5
dont get this game
Looks like a mobile port.
boring
i dont like
ass

Simply put.. don't waste the time or money, once apon a time the game was incredible it really was, ive got over 3200hr on ps and 127hrs logged with kino since swapping but in all this time the one consistent thing ive found is the game is getting horrendously worse, sure there and nice QOL updates etc but when the server browsers have been problematic to say the least for whats going on about 2 years now and nothing they do will fix it. they'd rather focus on other cash grab titles then actually build up and fix the one game the housed and fostered they're community. imagine having to sit there looking at the servers say "server error" when you try to join your friends/team/crew mates etc where it will bold face tell you "Asia" servers are empty and wont load anything yet the 12 people im in discord chatting to are all in the lobby waiting for the rest of us to get im but the game insists theres no lobby.. for us.. uhh huh.. and its been two years of this.. if you value your time and effort this ain't it fam.  At worst i hope this brings some sort of awareness to the issue but im not holding my breath for a fix.
i love this game so much but the amount of times i have to remake cars because they cant figure out saves is diabolical

the game was so bad unlike social media and if you searched it its all boring edits that looks nothing like the game
too many exensive DLCs
wont  recommend

I‚Äôm genuinely disappointed in the publishers of this game. This title is a nostalgic part of a franchise I‚Äôve loved for years, but after buying it, I realized the greedy developers didn‚Äôt spare even the smallest and most basic items. They turned almost every little thing in the game into paid DLC!
I hope you wake up and put an end to this blatant greed, because as things stand, I will never be willing to purchase any new installments of this game again.

from guy who drift in assetto corsa this game has horrible physics compare to each other but i can say its more likely beginner friendly in arcade way i dont know how to explain it

eventhough i didnt like it im sure its great game for other audience

If you want to waste your time and life, this game is for you. The controlls are shit, the car moves like crap and the in game weight of the cars are less then 50kg each. Any gentle touch will project you up in outer space.

only played just couple of minutes of it and just feels janky and shitty on controller, doesnt feel good and even feathering the throttle its either too much or not enough, too much turn or not enough going into walls, doesnt feel constant just feels wack

Testing it on free weekend.

  The good: 
1.Fun physics.
2.Vr, wheel and controller support. 
3.Bunch of meticulous tuning and parts for customizing.
4.Runs on a toaster

 The bad: 
1.The game loop is grinding  one lap runs on the same track infinite times for a few thousands until you have a million to buy and tune another car; this is mobile game tier grind made to force you into buying dlc money or unlocks.
2. Only 30 or so cars.
3. Tracks are not that good but you can add more through workshop and mods.

Bonus: Cant seem to join any multiplayer server so this makes me not recomend it. 

15$ is a good price for it, and is pretty accurate representation of what you get. Its not great its not awful.

For the love of God someone take this game out back and shoot it. 

Cars have one of two modes: Straight at mach fuck you or torqued to the balls that the track (Yes, track, singular, as in: I didn't want to play any further than the first level) feels like a love letter to a diddy party. 

Add to the fact that there's only a singular song stuck on a permanent loop I cannot stress this enough: I tried this game for the whopping total of $0.00 and still feel robbed.
There is no physics, no graphics, smoke flies in squares)) . There is no chat and the VR is also bad, I do not recommend it. I delete
Steering wheel autocorrecting, while the option is off, with my wheel the setting in the app is also off, and this is the only game I'm experiencing this issue with
This game sucks. Bad. Plays like a mobile game. Save your money and buy Asseto Corsa, or spend a little more and buy BeamNG.Drive.

im honestly extremely disappointed i was extremely excited to play this game but ever since buying it its been completely unplayable, i have gigabyte internet and cant make it 15 seconds into hosting my own lobby without rubber banding to the point of being so pissed at the game that i uninstalled because of how unplayable it was the devs need to figure their shit out so the servers are actually stable :( im extremely unhappy and wish i never spent the money on this game
this games is so poorly optimized, for example in gta 5 i get 120 to 130 fps in high settings and in this game i get 40 to 70 fps. game looks like its running in 480p rez
If you like forza horizon, and other unrealistic goofy games, this might be for you. If you like realistic drifting, go elsewhere, just my opinion
quite poor experience, multiplayer sucks and theres no hook - boring!
shit game i have played this game for 40hours and i have never linked a single turn and i have gone though 6 wheels and controllers and its just not made well pls don't waste your money

General impressions - Android game experience
Why would a car game not have one of the most important things for a car experience - a nice sound from the engines, how can the game, like in other Carx games, it's like a phone game from when we were in 2015 playing on our parents' phones:steambored:. Drifting is completely automatic and easy without any skill, and the cars are like on ice - you turn a little and it has already spun, the help option when drifting you lose control of the car and instead of helping, you have to adapt to it. The drifting is inevitable with "Drift mod", like in the real world drifting cars are un-drivable without spinning off everywhere. The game is just a mobile game ported to the PC, even if the graphics are beautiful, they are unrealistic and it's like they're making fun of the GTA 5 mod with realistic graphics, which when it rains and has reflections like a mirror looks realistic and beautiful:steamhappy:. The same remarks are made about the other CarX, they could have tried in this direction, and not just have good-looking tandem drifters and people thinking they are very good drivers :steamthumbsdown:.
says its vr but you cant even use your controllers, also the drifting is unrealistic
This games complete garbage I set all my bindings right for my wheel and nothing works just floors the car right when I start it without pressing nothing else
game is trash handling is so fake  i cant even comprehend on how to drive worst waste of money ever
wont connect to servers even tho im connected with no issues via ethernet cat8
cant even drift on my wheel i have 2 wheels used both i always spin in a 360 but i know it cant be me that it is happening too

literally every aspect is riddled with bugs
3/5
dont get this game

im honestly extremely disappointed i was extremely excited to play this game but ever since buying it its been completely unplayable, i have gigabyte internet and cant make it 15 seconds into hosting my own lobby without rubber banding to the point of being so pissed at the game that i uninstalled because of how unplayable it was the devs need to figure their shit out so the servers are actually stable :( im extremely unhappy and wish i never spent the money on this game
this games is so poorly optimized, for example in gta 5 i get 120 to 130 fps in high settings and in this game i get 40 to 70 fps. game looks like its running in 480p rez

quite poor experience, multiplayer sucks and theres no hook - boring!
shit game i have played this game for 40hours and i have never linked a single turn and i have gone though 6 wheels and controllers and its just not made well pls don't waste your money

General impressions - Android game experience
Why would a car game not have one of the most important things for a car experience - a nice sound from the engines, how can the game, like in other Carx games, it's like a phone game from when we were in 2015 playing on our parents' phones:steambored:. Drifting is completely automatic and easy without any skill, and the cars are like on ice - you turn a little and it has already spun, the help option when drifting you lose control of the car and instead of helping, you have to adapt to it. The drifting is inevitable with "Drift mod", like in the real world drifting cars are un-drivable without spinning off everywhere. The game is just a mobile game ported to the PC, even if the graphics are beautiful, they are unrealistic and it's like they're making fun of the GTA 5 mod with realistic graphics, which when it rains and has reflections like a mirror looks realistic and beautiful:steamhappy:. The same remarks are made about the other CarX, they could have tried in this direction, and not just have good-looking tandem drifters and people thinking they are very good drivers :steamthumbsdown:.
This games complete garbage I set all my bindings right for my wheel and nothing works just floors the car right when I start it without pressing nothing else
game is trash handling is so fake  i cant even comprehend on how to drive worst waste of money ever
wont connect to servers even tho im connected with no issues via ethernet cat8
cant even drift on my wheel i have 2 wheels used both i always spin in a 360 but i know it cant be me that it is happening too

literally every aspect is riddled with bugs
3/5

I‚Äôm genuinely disappointed in the publishers of this game. This title is a nostalgic part of a franchise I‚Äôve loved for years, but after buying it, I realized the greedy developers didn‚Äôt spare even the smallest and most basic items. They turned almost every little thing in the game into paid DLC!
I hope you wake up and put an end to this blatant greed, because as things stand, I will never be willing to purchase any new installments of this game again.

from guy who drift in assetto corsa this game has horrible physics compare to each other but i can say its more likely beginner friendly in arcade way i dont know how to explain it

eventhough i didnt like it im sure its great game for other audience

If you want to waste your time and life, this game is for you. The controlls are shit, the car moves like crap and the in game weight of the cars are less then 50kg each. Any gentle touch will project you up in outer space.

only played just couple of minutes of it and just feels janky and shitty on controller, doesnt feel good and even feathering the throttle its either too much or not enough, too much turn or not enough going into walls, doesnt feel constant just feels wack

Testing it on free weekend.

  The good: 
1.Fun physics.
2.Vr, wheel and controller support. 
3.Bunch of meticulous tuning and parts for customizing.
4.Runs on a toaster

 The bad: 
1.The game loop is grinding  one lap runs on the same track infinite times for a few thousands until you have a million to buy and tune another car; this is mobile game tier grind made to force you into buying dlc money or unlocks.
2. Only 30 or so cars.
3. Tracks are not that good but you can add more through workshop and mods.

Bonus: Cant seem to join any multiplayer server so this makes me not recomend it. 

15$ is a good price for it, and is pretty accurate representation of what you get. Its not great its not awful.

For the love of God someone take this game out back and shoot it. 

Cars have one of two modes: Straight at mach fuck you or torqued to the balls that the track (Yes, track, singular, as in: I didn't want to play any further than the first level) feels like a love letter to a diddy party. 

Add to the fact that there's only a singular song stuck on a permanent loop I cannot stress this enough: I tried this game for the whopping total of $0.00 and still feel robbed.
